description: Biocompost is a qualified waste management company based in Quito, established in 2018. We focus on transforming organic waste into compost, promoting a circular economy model. By collecting waste from households and businesses, we not only reduce landfill contributions but also return compost to our clients for reforestation and sustainable practices. Our initiative emphasizes environmental education and community involvement, aiming to foster a collective commitment to reducing carbon footprints and enhancing food sustainability.
name: Biocompost
